name: Yūgō (Switching Brains)
description:
Fuse the planets in the right order of elements to form a happy new inhabitable planet.

The original game was made for the BTP Game Jam #2 and is playable for free online. This release has new levels, features and player feedback changes:

- Changed tutorial a bit
- Level indicator
- You get some extra time after a fusion is successfull
- Restart level button
- New planets graphics
- Local hiscores (Hiscore is the most seconds left after level completed)
- UFO enemy

Controls mouse.

Credits
Programming; Dennis van Koningsbruggen
Graphics: Dennis van Koningsbruggen
Music: Darren Izzard
SFX: Universal Sound FX
